garden-app-id.name: garden-app-id
garden-app-id.description: If you do not yet have an app ID, please follow these [steps](/api-reference/setup).

default.description: Default policy for routes not covered by specific rules

isolation_groups.description: Assets in an isolation group can ONLY trade with other assets in the same group

blacklist_pairs.description: Explicitly forbidden trading pairs using pattern matching

whitelist_overrides.description: Explicit overrides that bypass other restrictions

competitors.description: Dynamic object where keys are competitor names and values contain duration and fees

get.summary: Get instant refund hash for the given swap.

get.description: Get quote for the given asset pair.

get.summary: Get all the supported chains and assets.

200.description: Object with supported chains and assets.

get.summary: Get all the supported assets on the given chain.

parameters.name: garden-app-id
parameters.description: Garden app ID for affiliate fee information

200.description: Total swap fees or affiliate fees if garden-app-id is provided. For affiliate fees, claim_amount and claim_transaction are only included if the affiliate has not yet claimed their fees.

get.description: Returns policy rules that clients can use to determine valid swap routes locally. Includes isolation groups, blacklists, and whitelists.

get.summary: Get detailed volume metrics and analytics.

200.description: Detailed volume metrics and analytics data.
